Content.Name: AFY Winter
Content.Title: AFY Winter Main Info.
Content.Abstract: If you're looking to add some more excitement to your winter break, check out AFY Winter Bash. Your stay will be at the beautiful Badger Creek Ranch at the hills of the Grand Teton Mountains. Come enjoy 3 days and 2 nights of thrilling activities, inspiring devotionals, and lasting memories. You'll spend a day snowboarding or skiing at Grand Targhee Resort, another sledding on Badger Creek's famous sledding hill, and finally we'll thaw out at Green Canyon Hot Springs. Enjoy the company of other youth that share your same values while you learn and grow together!
Content.BodyCopy:
We appreciate your interest in this Adventure For Youth- Winter. Due to the increase in the number of students at BYU-Idaho, our department resources are being reassigned to other areas. We will no longer be able to offer many of the programs that we used to provide.  Read Letter to the Community for more information.

We would like to thank you for your past support of our programs. We have had many enjoyable years and appreciate the contributions and value that you brought to our programs. If you are still interested in this type of program, we suggest that you look for other alternatives provided by BYU-Idaho or the community.

A link to a web site with information about an alternative option for this program is listed below:

  • Badger Creek

December 2012

If you're looking to add some more excitement to your winter break, check out AFY Winter Bash.  Your stay will be at the beautiful Badger Creek Ranch at the hills of the Grand Teton Mountains. Come enjoy 3 days and 2 nights of thrilling activities, inspiring devotionals, and lasting memories.  You'll spend a day snowboarding or skiing at Grand Targhee Resort, another sledding on Badger Creek's famous sledding hill, and finally a night snowboarding or skiing at Kelly Canyon Enjoy the company of other youth that share your same values while you learn and grow together!

Equipment

Participants are responsible for providing skiing or snowboarding equipment. Rentals are available through the Outdoor Resource Center on campus.

Prices are subject to change. For more information visit www.byui.edu/outdoor-resource-center

Registration

Questions? Please call (208) 496-1200.
